name: FPSWYCAAE
description:
Created for the GMTK Game Jam 2018 where the theme was Genre without a Mechanic, where you take away something intrinsic to the genre to force yourself to figure out different ways of providing the same equivalent feature set.

In this game, you will lower your gun when pointing at the enemies and can't shoot while doing so, however your bullets bounce around the room.

I had a lot of problems about half-way through development and had to cut several planned ideas and simplify things a lot...
